subject: p17704774
History: Patient with pneumothorax and metastatic renal cell cancer. Evaluate size of pneumothorax.
Findings: Comparison is made to previous study from. There are again seen diffuse masses and nodules throughout both lungs consistent with known widespread metastatic disease. There is a right-sided chest tube with distal tip at the right apex. The size of the pneumothorax at the right base, right lower chest wall, and right lung apex is unchanged. There is a persistent left retrocardiac opacity and left-sided pleural effusion. Hardware within the thoracic spine is again visualized.
